ai.summary: A short, easy 3.6 km section of the Green Chain Walk known as Chinbrook Link. This route runs through urban greenspace, making it a quick, family-friendly stroll suitable for beginners.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat, well-surfaced paths. The trail uses paved sidewalks, compact gravel paths, and park trails, with occasional grassy edges and road-side links. Generally easy for most walkers and accessible to strollers on most sections.
ai.safety_notes: Stay aware of pedestrians and cyclists on shared paths. Cross busy roads at designated crossings, and carry a map or GPS. Wear weather-appropriate clothing, carry water, and be mindful of changing UK conditions. Daylight hours can be short in winter; plan accordingly.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map or local map
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn offers the most comfortable conditions, with milder weather and longer daylight. The route is walkable year-round with appropriate gear.
